system.description:
A tin of Mentats, their formula altered to reduce social anxiety, boost confidence, and make users more aware of body language and other social cues.

  • Mentat Addiction: A failed addiction roll renders you addicted to Mentats. You increase the difficulty of all CHA tests by +1 whenever you are not under the effects of a type of Mentat (ordinary Mentats, or the Berry, Grape, or Orange versions).
system.effect: Reduce the difficulty of CHA tests by 2, to a minimum of 0| Re-roll 1d20 on Barter tests.
